thag21.1:6.4: Nibbanatho avanatho sa → nibbanatho anato sa hi (sya1, sya2); nibbanathā avanatho sa hi (pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed); nibbanatho arato sa hi (^sn8.2#1 [2. Aratīsutta])
thag21.1:8.4: limpati → lippati (bj, sya1, sya2, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed) | tamāhu → taṃ munimāhu (pts-vp-pli2ed ^sn8.2#1 [2. Aratīsutta])
thag21.1:14.1: akhilo idha → akhilo (bj); akhilo idham (pts-vp-pli1ed); akhilodha (pts-vp-pli2ed ^sn8.3#1 [3. Pesalasutta])
thag21.1:16.4: () → Saṅkhāre parato passa dukkhato mā ca attato, nibbāpehi mahārāgaṃ mā ḍayihittho punappunaṃ (bj ^sn8.4#1 [4. Ānandasutta])
thag21.1:24.4: udiyyati → udīrayi (bj, pts-vp-pli2ed ^sn8.6#1 [6. Sāriputtasutta]); udīyyati (sya1, pts-vp-pli1ed); udayyati (?)
thag21.1:36.2: Sabbaṭhitīnaṃ → sabbaṭṭhitīnaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed) | atikkamamaddasa → atikkamamaddā (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed, mr)
thag21.1:49.4: nirāmagataddasā → niyāmagataddasā (bj, pts-vp-pli2ed); niyāmagataṃdasā (sya1, sya2, pts-vp-pli1ed)
thag21.1:53.3: Suvibhattesu → saṃvibhattesu (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed); savibhattesu (si, mr)
thag21.1:60.4: Jotimantopi na pabhāseyyuṃ → na jotimantopi narā tapeyyuṃ (^snp2.12#162 [Nigrodhakappa (vaṅgīsa)
